Service Details: - Recycles electronics (accepts "broken" TVs and computer monitors), small appliances, paint, pesticides, solvents and flammable liquids, smoke and CO alarms, major appliances, outdoor power equipment, power tools, residential fixtures and lighting, and commercial lights at this location- Operates a paint exchange at this location- This depot is a Multi-Material BC drop-off location- For a complete list, please visit the Return-It website or call the office
